name: A Game of Pure Skill
description:
IF RUN IN WEB, IT WILL BE CUT OFF. Go in full screen to fix that issue. If you are still having trouble, download the Windows build, which should work. In the meantime, I'll get better at making sure different resolutions work with my games.

NOTE: This game was originally a submission for the Weekly Game Jam 141, the theme being "Good Luck". I didn't realize that the due date was a day earlier, the length of the jam being 6 days instead of 7 days that I thought it lasted ¯\_(ツ)_/¯. I decided to spend a little more time adding more content. This is the second game jam I have participated in now. 

A Game of Pure Skill

This is a card game in which everything is randomized. Play different cards to influence your chances and hopefully to defeat your opponent. To pick up a card, just click it with your mouse (don't drag), and place it on any green selection boxes that should be flashing. 

Made in Unity by Gregory Weber.
